Cocktail recipe.Name: Alexander
Cocktail recipe.Taste: 코냑의 진한향과 Crème de Cacao의 달달함, Fresh Cream의 부드러움이 섞인 진하고 달달한 칵테일
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes.
2. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish: Sprinkle fresh ground nutmeg on top.
Cocktail recipe.Histoy: The Alexander cocktail was born in London in 1922 by Hery Mc Elhone, at Ciro's Club in honor of a famous bride, at the beginning it was called Panama, Gin was used instead of Cognac and light cocoa cream instead of dark.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Grasshopper
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Pour all ingredients into shaker filled with ice.
2. Shake briskly for few seconds.
3. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Alexandra
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes.
2. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Alexander's Sister
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes.
2. Shake and strain
Cocktail recipe.Garnish: Sprinkle fresh ground nutmeg on top.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Alejandro
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes.
2. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish: Sprinkle fresh ground nutmeg on top.
Cocktail recipe.Histoy: The Alexander cocktail was born in London in 1922 by Hery Mc Elhone, at Ciro's Club in honor of a famous bride, at the beginning it was called Panama, Gin was used instead of Cognac and light cocoa cream instead of dark.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Americano
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Mix the ingredients directly in an old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes.
2. Add a splash of Soda Water.
3. Stir gently.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish: Garnish with half orange slice and a lemon zest.
Cocktail recipe.Histoy:
The story of the Americano dates back to the second half of the 1800s in Gaspare Campari's bar in Milan. Over the years the cocktail acquires notoriety thanks to some homages from the world of cinema, including James Bond (007 Casino Royale) whose favorite cocktail was, precisely, the Americano. 
The nickname "American" was born when Primo Carnera, a giant Italian boxer, became world heavyweight champion at Madison Square Garden in New York. When Carnera returned to Italy with the title, he was greeted with this very Italian cocktail which, for the occasion, was called "Americano". 
The Americano entered the IBA Cocktail List only in 1987 but, in reality, it was a cocktail that spread all over Italy during the 1930s.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Angel Face
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes.
2. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Cocktail recipe.Histoy: Although the origin of the cocktail is not known, the main hypotheses assume that it was born in the twenties of the twentieth century in France: this thesis would prove the presence of calvados, a liqueur commonly used in France and, in particular, in that period, as an epidemic of phylloxera in European vineyards had limited the production of brandy. On this basis, one of the most frequent hypotheses has it that the cocktail was created by Harry MacElhone, founder of Harry's New York Bar in Paris on July 19, 1919, in honor of the celebrations for the victory of the First World War. The first reliable evidence, however, dates back to 1930 when Harry Craddock included the Angel Face among the recipes of his book "Savoy cocktail book". Some sources indicate that the name derives from that of an American gangster active during Prohibition; less likely the dedication to Rick Blaine, the protagonist of Casablanca played by Humphrey Bogart, as the film follows the first testimonies (1942).

Cocktail recipe.Name: Aviation
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Add all ingredients into a cocktail shaker.
2. Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Cocktail recipe.Histoy:
Aviation was created in New York at the Walkick hotel by the head bartender Hugo Ensslin while he was writing his book "Recipes for Mixed Drinks" (1916) one of the last cocktail books published before the start of American Prohibition.
Lately David Wondrich found the aviation recipe in a 1911 magazine, so the recipe is thought to have been born earlier then 1916.
 In his book Ensslin also indicates the type of Gin to be used 'El Bart Gin "and the recipe is made up in addition to gin, with lemon juice, maraschino Luxardo and Creme di Violette.
The recipe is found again in Harry Craddock's 1930 Savoy Cocktail Book but without the Creme de Violette, this probably due to the difficulty of finding the violet cream during the post-war period In the 1960s it was still unavailable and therefore, simply, the basic ingredient of the Aviation cocktail was discontinued and the bartenders definitively gave up the characteristic blue color of the drink.
The IBA proposes it today in its original version with the creme de violette which is now on the market again.  This fragrant ingredient not only gave the mix a sweetly floral taste, but also gave it a beautiful sky blue color.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Barracuda
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker except the Prosecco, shake well with ice.
2. strain into chilled highball glass filled with ice and top up with Prosecco.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish: Pineapple and Cherry, optional mint sprig for additional aroma.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Bee's Knees
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Stir honey with lemon and orange juices until it dissolves, add gin and shake with ice.
2. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish: Optionally garnish with a lemon or orange zest.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Bellini
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Pour peach puree into the mixing glass with ice, add the Prosecco wine.
2. Stir gently and pour in a chilled flute glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: PUCCINI
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Fresh Mandarin Orange Juice into mixing glass with ice, add prosecco wine.
2. stir slowly and pour into cold flute glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: ROSSINI
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Fresh Strawberry Puree into mixing glass with ice, add prosecco wine.
2. stir slowly and pour into cold flute glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: TINTORETTO
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Fresh Pomegranate Juice. into mixing glass with ice, add prosecco wine.
2. stir slowly and pour into cold flute glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Between the Sheets
Cocktail recipe.Method: Add all ingredients into a cocktail shaker. Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Black Russian
Cocktail recipe.Method:
Pour the ingredients into the old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes.
2. Stir gently.

Cocktail recipe.Name: White Russian
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Pour the ingredients into the old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes.
2. Stir gently.
3. Float fresh cream on the top and stir in slowly.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Bloody Mary
Cocktail recipe.Method:
Stir gently all the ingredients in a mixing glass with ice, pour into rocks glass. 

 Note : If requested served with ice, pour into highball glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Boulevardier
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes.
2. Stir well.
3. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish: Garnish with orange zest, optionally a lemon zest.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Bramble
Cocktail recipe.Method: 1. Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker except the Crème de Mûre, shake well with ice, strain into chilled old fashioned glass filled with crushed ice, then pour the blackberry liqueur (Crème de Mûre) over the top of the drink, in a circular motion.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish: Garnish optionally with a lemon slice and blackberries.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Brandy Crusta
Cocktail recipe.Method: Mix together all ingredients with ice cubes in a mixing glass and strain into prepared slim cocktail glass.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish: Rub a slice of orange (or lemon) around the rim of the glass and dip it in pulverized white sugar, so that the sugar will adhere to the edge of the glass. Carefully curling place the orange/lemon peel around the inside of the glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Canchanchara
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Mix honey with water and lime juice and spread the mixture on the bottom and sides of the glass. 
2. Add cracked ice, and then the rum. End by energetically stirring from bottom to top.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Caipirinha
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Place lime and sugar into a double old fashioned glass and muddle gently.
2. Fill the glass with cracked ice and add Cachaça.
3. Stir gently to involve ingredients.

Cocktail recipe.Name: CAIPIROSKA
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Place lime and sugar into a double old fashioned glass and muddle gently.
2. Fill the glass with cracked ice and add Vodka. 
3. Stir gently to involve ingredients.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Casino
Cocktail recipe.Method: Pour all ingredients into cocktails shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled rocks glass with ice.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish: Garnish with lemon zest and a maraschino cherry.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Champagne Cocktail
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Place the sugar cube with 2 dashes of bitters in a large Champagne glass, add the cognac.
2. Pour gently chilled Champagne.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish: Garnish with orange zest and maraschino cherry.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Clover Club
Cocktail recipe.Method: Pour all ingredients into cocktails shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Corpse Reviver #2
Cocktail recipe.Method: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice. Shake well and strain in chilled cocktail glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Cosmopolitan
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Add all ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice.
2. Shake well and strain into a large cocktail glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Cuba Libre
Cocktail recipe.Method: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Daiquiri
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. In a cocktail shaker add all ingredients.
2. Stir well to dissolve the sugar. Add ice and shake.
3. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Dark 'n' stormy
Cocktail recipe.Method: In a highball glass filled with ice pour the ginger beer and top floating with the Rum.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish: Garnish with a lime wedge or slice.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Dry Martini
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes.
2. Stir well.
3. Strain into chilled martini cocktail glass.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish: Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink, or garnish with green olives if requested.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Espresso Martini
Cocktail recipe.Method: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Fernandito
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Pour the Fernet Branca into a double old fashioned glass with ice, fill the glass up with Cola.
2. Gently stir.

Cocktail recipe.Name: French 75
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Pour all the ingredients, except Champagne, into a shaker.
2. Shake well and strain into a Champagne flute.
3. Top up with Champagne. Stir gently.

Cocktail recipe.Name: French Connection
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Pour all ingredients directly into an old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes.
2. Stir gently.

Cocktail recipe.Name: French Martini
Cocktail recipe.Method: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish: Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Gin Fizz
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Shake all ingredients with ice except soda water.
2. Pour into thin tall Tumbler glass, top with a splash soda water.
 Note : Serve without ice.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish: Garnish with a lemon slice, optional lemon zest.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Golden Dream
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Pour all ingredients into shaker filled with ice.
2. Shake briskly for few seconds.
3. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Hanky Panky
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well.
2. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Hemingway Special
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Pour all ingredients into a shaker with ice.
2. Shake well and strain into a large cocktail glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Horse's Neck
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Pour Cognac and ginger ale directly into a highball glass with ice cubes.
2. Stir gently.
3. If preferred, add dashes of Angostura Bitter.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish: Garnish with a rind of one lemon spiral.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Illegal
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Pour all ingredients into the shaker.
2. Shake vigorously with ice.
3.  Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, or "on the rocks" in a traditional clay or terracotta mug.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Irish Coffee
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Warm black coffee is poured into a pre-heated Irish coffee glass.
2. Whiskey and at least one teaspoon of sugar is added and stirred until dissolved.
3. Fresh thick chilled cream is carefully poured over the back of a spoon held just above the surface of the coffee.
4. The layer of cream will float on the coffee without mixing.
5. Plain sugar can be replaced with sugar syrup

Cocktail recipe.Name: John Collins
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Pour all ingredients directly into a highball filled with ice.
2. Stir gently.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish: Garnish with a lemon slice and maraschino cherry.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Tom Collins
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Pour all ingredients directly into a highball filled with ice.
2. Stir gently.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish: Garnish with a lemon slice and maraschino cherry.

Cocktail recipe.Name: KIR
Cocktail recipe.Method: Pour Crème de Cassis into glass, top up with white wine.

Cocktail recipe.Name: KIR ROYAL
Cocktail recipe.Method: Pour Crème de Cassis into glass, top up with champagne.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Last word
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Add all ingredients into a cocktail shaker.
2. Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Lemon Drop Martini
Cocktail recipe.Method: 1. Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish: Garnish with sugar rim around the glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Long Island Ice Tea
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Add all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice.
2. Stir gently.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Mai-Tai
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice.
2. Shake and pour into a double rocks glass or a highball glass. 

 * The Martinique molasses rum used by Trader Vic was not an Agricole rum but a type of "rummy" from molasses.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish: Garnish with pineapple spear, mint leaves, and lime peel.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Manhattan
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes.
2. Stir well.
3. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Margarita
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice.
2. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass

Cocktail recipe.Name: Martinez
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes.
2. Stir well.
3. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Mary Pickford
Cocktail recipe.Method: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Mimosa
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1.Pour orange juice into a flute glass and gently pour the sparkling wine.
2. Stir gently.

 Note : Also known as Buck's Fizz.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Mint Julep
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. In Julep Stainless Steel Cup gently muddle the mint with sugar and water.
2. Fill the glass with cracked ice, add the Bourbon and stir well until the cup frosts.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Mojito
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Mix mint springs with sugar and lime juice.
2. Add splash of soda water and fill the glass with ice.
3. Pour the rum and top with soda water.
4. Light stir to involve all ingredients.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish: Garnish with sprigs of mint and slice of lime.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Monkey Gland
Cocktail recipe.Method: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Moscow Mule
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. In a Mule Cup or rocks glass, combine the vodka and ginger beer.
2. Add lime juice and gently stir to involve all ingredients.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Naked and Famous
Cocktail recipe.Method: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Negroni
Cocktail recipe.Method: Pour all ingredients directly into a chilled old fashioned glass filled with ice, Stir gently.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish: Garnish with a half orange slice.

Cocktail recipe.Name: New York Sour
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Pour all ingredients into the shaker.
2. Shake vigorously with ice.
3.  Strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with ice.
4. Float the wine on top.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish: Garnish with lemon or orange zest with cherry.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Old Cuban
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker except the wine, shake well with ice, strain into chilled elegant cocktail glass.
2. Top up with the sparkling wine.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Old Fashioned
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Place sugar cube in old fashioned glass and saturate with bitter, add few dashes of plain water.
2. Muddle until dissolved.
3. Fill the glass with ice cubes and add whiskey.
4. Stir gently.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish: Garnish with an orange slice or zest, and a cocktail cherry.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Paloma
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Poor the tequila into a highball glass, squeeze the lime juice.
2. Add ice and salt, fill up pink grapefruit soda.
3. Stir gently.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish: Garnish with a slice of lime.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Paper Plane
Cocktail recipe.Method: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Paradise
Cocktail recipe.Method: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Penicillin
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Muddle fresh ginger in a shaker and add the remaining ingredients, except for the Islay single malt whiskey.
2. Fill the shaker with ice and shake.
3. Double-strain into a chilled old fashioned glass with ice.
4. Float the single malt whisky on top.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Pina Colada
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Blend all the ingredients with ice in an electric blender, pour into a large glass, and serve with straws. 

 Note : Historically a few drops of fresh lime juice were added to taste.
4 slices of fresh pineapple can be used instead of juice
Cocktail recipe.Garnish: Garnish with a slice of pineapple with a cocktail cherry.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Pisco Sour
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice.
2. Shake and strain into a chilled goblet glass.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish: Few dashes of Amargo bitters on top as an aromatic garnish.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Planter's Punch
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Pour all ingredients directly in a small tumbler or a typical terracotta glass.

NOTE : Add dilution up to taste, it can be given by water, ice or fresh juices.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Porto Flip
Cocktail recipe.Method: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Ramos Fizz
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Pour all ingredients except soda water in a cocktail shaker with ice, Shake for two minutes, double strain in a glass, pour the drink back in the shaker, and hard shake without ice for one minute.
2. Strain into a highball glass, top up with soda.

NOTE : The drink was invented by Henry Ramos in 1888, at his bar Meyer's Table d'Hôtel Internationale in New Orleans.
 The Ramos Fizz was originally shaken for 12 minutes by a crew of 30 bartenders who passed the shaker from one to another.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Russian Spring Punch
Cocktail recipe.Method: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker except the sparkling wine, shake well with ice, strain into a chilled tall tumbler glass filled with ice, and top up with sparkling wine.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish: Garnish with blackberries and optionally a lemon slice as well.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Rusty Nail
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Pour all ingredients directly into an old fashioned glass filled with ice.
2. Stir gently.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Sazerac
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Rinse a chilled old-fashioned glass with the absinthe, add crushed ice and set it aside.
2. Stir the remaining ingredients over ice in a mixing glass.
3. Discard the ice and any excess absinthe from the prepared glass, strain the mixed drink into the glass.

NOTE: The original recipe changed after the American Civil War, Rye Whiskey substituted Cognac as it became hard to obtain.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Sea Breeze
Cocktail recipe.Method: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish: Garnish with orange zest and cherry

Cocktail recipe.Name: Sex on the Beach
Cocktail recipe.Method: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish: Garnish with a half orange slice.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Sidecar
Cocktail recipe.Method: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Singapore Sling
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes.
2. Shake well.
3. Strain into Hurricane glass.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish: Garnish with pineapple and maraschino cherry

Cocktail recipe.Name: Spicy Fifty
Cocktail recipe.Method: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, double-strain into chilled cocktail glass.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish: Garnish with a red chili pepper

Cocktail recipe.Name: Spritz
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Build all ingredients into a wine glass filled with ice.
2. Stir gently.

 NOTE: There are other versions of the Spritz that use Campari, Cynar or Select instead of Aperol.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish: Garnish with a slice of orange.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Spritz (ver. Campari
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Build all ingredients into a wine glass filled with ice.
2. Stir gently.

 NOTE: There are other versions of the Spritz that use Aperol, Cynar or Select instead of Campari.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish: Garnish with a slice of orange.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Spritz (ver. Select
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Build all ingredients into a wine glass filled with ice.
2. Stir gently.

 NOTE: There are other versions of the Spritz that use Campari, Cynar or Aperol instead of Select.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish: Garnish with a slice of orange.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Spritz (ver. Cynar
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Build all ingredients into a wine glass filled with ice.
2. Stir gently.

 NOTE: There are other versions of the Spritz that use Campari, Select or Aperol instead of Cynar.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish: Garnish with a slice of orange.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Stinger
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes.
2. Stir well.
3. Strain into chilled martini cocktail glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Suffering Bastard
Cocktail recipe.Method: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker except the ginger beer, shake well with ice, Pour unstrained into a Collins glass or in the original S. Bastard mug and top up with ginger beer.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish: Garnish with mint springs and optionally an orange slice as well.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Tequila Sunrise
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Pour tequila and orange juice directly into highball glass filled with ice cubes.
2. Add the grenadine syrup to create chromatic effect (sunrise), do not stir.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish: Garnish with half orange slice or an orange zest

Cocktail recipe.Name: Tipperary
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes.
2. Stir well.
3. Strain into chilled martini cocktail glass.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish: Garnish with a slice of orange.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Tommy's Margarita
Cocktail recipe.Method: 1. Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into a chilled rocks glass filled with ice.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Trinidad Sour
Cocktail recipe.Method: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Tuxedo
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes.
2. Stir well.
3. Strain into chilled martini cocktail glass.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish: Garnish with cherry and lemon zest

Cocktail recipe.Name: VE.N.TO
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Pour all ingredients into the shaker.
2. Shake vigorously with ice.
3. Strain into a chilled small tumbler glass filled with ice.

 Notes : *If desired water can be replaced by chamomile infusion in the honey mix.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish: Garnish with lemon zest and white grapes.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Vesper
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes.
2. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Vieux Carrè
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes.
2. Stir well.
3. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish: Garnish with orange zest and maraschino cherry.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Whiskey Sour
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice.
2. Shake well
3. Strain into cobbler glass.
4. If served "On the rocks", strain ingredients into an old fashioned glass filled with ice.

NOTE : If egg white is used shake little harder to release and incorporate the foam from the egg white.
Cocktail recipe.Garnish: Garnish with a half orange slice and maraschino cherry, optionally use orange zest.

Cocktail recipe.Name: White Lady
Cocktail recipe.Method: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Yellow Bird
Cocktail recipe.Method: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

Cocktail recipe.Name: Zombie
Cocktail recipe.Method:
1. Add all ingredients into an electric blender with 170 grams of cracked ice.
2. With pulse bottom blend for a few seconds.
3. Serve in a tall tumbler glass.

Note : *Donn's Mix: 2 parts of fresh yellow grapefruit and 1 part of cinnamon syrup
